name: Rolling Islands - Concept
description:
Welcome to Rolling Islands! A  small game concept made under one week. 

First Mission - Roll and destroy enemies in a floating island.

Second Mission -  Fly through fragments to go your final destination.

Bonus: "SandBox" mode.

CONTROLS

DESCKEYBOARD &  MOUSEXBOX JOY.MOVEWASD/ARROW KEYSLEFT ANALOGFIRE ATTACKLEFT CTRL/LEFT MOUSE BUTTONXRESET LEVELRYCreate Tree [SandBox]1n/aCreate Water  [SandBox]2n/aCreate Ramp  [SandBox]3n/aCreate Cloud  [SandBox]4n/aIncrease/Decrease Speed [SandBox]+/-n/aIncrease/Decrease Light [SandBox]F2/F3n/a
